Redhat Linux Upgrade

29 Sep 1999

Red Hat, makers of the popular linux distribution which runs many of the Internets webservers, have announced that they'll begin offering Redhat 6.1 as soon as next week.

New features include a slick graphical installer, increased driver support, and improved clustering capabilities.

Techweb has some more information.
